entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 8:18 PM NDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 8:18 PM NDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 7.
